comment.author: 24803123@N04
comment._content: I love this transition era between horse modern cars

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Me too - I think that's why the photo appealed to me. 

I guess there are lots of points in time like this - gas lights & electric lightbulbs, typewriters and word processors - but it's amazing to reflect on photographic evidence. 

-- Courtney
